capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has an affiliation with the Hog's Head pub. It's pretty interesting to think about how his background might have influenced his... let's say, 'unique' approach to discipline at the school.

I'm not really sure about Filch's affiliation with the Hogwarts staff. I mean, he's always been a bit of an outsider, and his behavior can be pretty intimidating. But at the same time, he does seem to have a certain... let's say, loyalty to the school? I'm not entirely convinced that he's on their side, but I think it's safe to say he's not exactly working against them either.
